## Profile Overview
**Name:** RANDRIAMBOLOLONA Tolotra Anthony (Arthinez)
**Role:** Developer & Cybersecurity Student
**Institution:** 42 School Antananarivo (Common Core since Feb 2024)
**Location:** Antananarivo, Madagascar
**Focus:** Low-level programming, System Security, Data Science.

## Core Competencies
Arthinez specializes in **low-level system programming** and **cybersecurity**.

- **Languages:** C, C++, Assembly, Shell Scripting (Bash), Python, SQL.
- **System:** Linux Administration, Docker, detailed understanding of OS architecture.
- **Security:** Network Analysis, Reverse Engineering, Vulnerability Assessment.
- **Data:** Data Science fundamentals, Analytical thinking.
- **Soft Skills:** Problem Solving, Team Leadership (Student Council Treasurer), Collaboration.

## Achievements
